籤詩版本二:
Kupinda nokubuda mumusasa kunotsvaka kubudirira kukuru, sejadhi risina mhosva rakavigwa mubwe
Kana iwe uine munhu ane mbiri anokutungamirira, iwe ucharopafadzwa nehupfumi uye nzvimbo dzakanaka panguva ino.
詩意:
Iri dombo rehexagram rinomiririra pfuma yakavanzwa mariri.
Zvose zvinofamba zvakanaka.
解曰: Kufanana nedombo rakavanza jade. Mirayiridzo yomurume anokudzwa inongogutsa. Kufara uye kudada.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Mambo Yang akatarisa Qionghua
Iyo viburnum inotumbuka kamwe pagore, uye manheru. Emperor Yang weSui Dynasty akanzwa mumwe munhu achiti ruva reQionghua muYangzhou rakanga risingaenzaniswi munyika, rakachena sejade, rine nyasha, rakapfava uye rakanaka. Vachitora murongo wehumambo muchikepe cheshato, vakaenda kuYangzhou kunonakidzwa nemaruva, ayo aive azere nekushamisira uye kupenya, aine mireza ichibhururuka.
(Dimikira renyaya iyi nderokuti zvinhu zvakakosha se”Qionghua” iyi. Kana ikasaonekwa inenge isina chinhu. Kana ikadaro inokushamisa.)
聖意: Imba inofara, munhu ane hutano, kutsvaga pfuma, uye kutengeserana kunobudirira, muchato unobudirira, Liujia anoberekwa, mukomana ari kufamba, munda makonye esirika, mhuka nhanhatu dzinoshingaira, munhu awanikwa, mhosva. inohwinwa, pfuma yakarasika inotyisa, chirwere ichi ndecheAnshan, guva rinotyisa
